meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Stephanie Gumble Rebecca O'Brien Bob Kennedy Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6028.

td.p: Stephanie Gumble, an associate director of policy from Boston, Massachusetts
Rebecca O'Brien, a writer from Brooklyn, New York
Bob Kennedy, a college linguistics instructor from Santa Barbara, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $17,700)

tr.td: BRIGHT LIGHTS, BIG CITY
(Alex: With the pictures provided thanks to NASA.)
2010 EMMY WINNERS
ORGANIZATIONS
MISSING BODY PARTS
DWIGHT EISENHOWER
I LIKE "IKE"
